Weird. youtube.com/user/bluerider2012 ((NUFORC Note:  We have looked at the footage, and we cannot certify that the anomalous object, seen hovering over a nearby area, is a genuine UFO.  Since the object is seen to move, relative to the camera, and relative to nearby objects on the ground, we wonder whether the object could have been either a soaring bird, or a sailplane.  PD))

records.summary: The skies were clear and the stars were very visible. I was walking into Griffith Park in Los Angeles and happened to look up. Directly
records.story: The skies were clear and the stars were very visible.   I was walking into Griffith Park in Los Angeles and happened to look up.  Directly overhead I noticed a small light, very high and about the brightness of the stars in Ursa Major.  It was moving south much slower than a satellite.  As I continued to watch it made a wide 90% turn to the west and slowly disappeared.   The whole sighting took about 2 minutes.

records.summary: Silver Objects Hovering Above Los Angeles
records.story: Silver Objects Hovering Above Los Angeles It has taken me some time to finally write about this issue.  For a number of years now I have seen either a single star like object in the daytime very high up hovering in the sky or I have seen a formation of these same objects.  On one occasion I was with two other individuals and pointed them out and they saw them and we watched them move and hover in ways that no traditional aircraft operate. I am writing this now because this past weekend on two consecutive days (August 9th and 10th) I saw a single silver star like object motionless in the daytime sky. Both days were perfect weather wise with very clear visibility. On August the 9th in the afternoon at about 4 PM PST I noticed a silver colored point of light hovering in Eastern Sky perhaps 50 to 55 degrees from the horizon. I thought it might be a plane moving away from me and the sun was reflecting on it at an odd angle. But it just hung there with what I thought was perhaps a vibrating like movement. My wife was standing with me holding our 3 month old as we were preparing to go on a walk and she saw it as well. After about 3 to 5 minutes we couldn’t see it anymore. It appeared to just fade away but not like an object moving off – it either faded out or turned in such a way that the sun wasn’t hitting it. I think it important to note that the light may have been the sun reflecting off the object but while the object appeared very small and far away it was star like and obviously bright enough to been seen by the naked eye. The following day on the 10th at approximately 5:30 in the afternoon I again took the baby outside to sit on our front porch swing which faces east. I had this odd feeling that I would see the object again and when I looked up between two nearby trees there it was again in the sky. The object was higher this time but brighter and closer to my position. It began to slowly drift a bit from North to South and I knew in a moment it would be obscured by the leaves of one of the trees. Now I don’t know why but I tried, perhaps foolishly, to meditate on the object and make a "connection," but it just kept drifting very, very slowly south. It was not a balloon, plane or helicopter and again the sky was perfectly clear and visibility was excellent. It would soon be out of my view so I slowly got up and went to see it from the front yard but when I looked up again it was gone. I searched the sky but to no avail. The entire encounter again lasted maybe five minutes but certainly less than ten. I am writing to you because I have seen these objects in the sky in LA before. They are not traditional aircraft. In the past I have seen them in formation and have seen them do patterns and maneuvers that, in my opinion, can not be easily explained. I have seen them with others present so I know I’m not just imagining things. Could these be the US military aerial Predator drones? I was thinking perhaps they are tested out from a nearby base. Wouldn’t they hover at high altitude? Could I just be seeing a satellite in geosynchronous orbit? ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous;  provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Black oval shape w/heat waves visible over 5 freeway in Silverlake
records.story: Black oval shape w/heat waves visible over 5 freeway in Silverlake On the morning of August 30, 2010, I was taking pictures of the beautiful sunrise in LA, looking southeast from my balcony toward Eagle Rock and the 5 freeway.  I took 15-20 pics every couple of minutes as the sun broke through the clouds. The following morning I downloaded the pics off the camera and saw this black, oval object toward the right of the clouds that I did not see while taking the pictures.  It only appeared in this one picture so I am CERTAIN it is not a dust speck on the lens.  I can see heat waves around it.   Also, I am pretty sure it’s not a helicopter.  They fly over all the time and I hear them.   This was a silent morning, except for the freeway sounds below.

records.summary: Strange Light Observed over Santa Monica Bay
records.story: Strange Light Observed over Santa Monica Bay On 9/25/2010 at approximately 9:45 PM my wife and I observed a very strange light over Santa Monica Bay from the Palos Verdes Peninsula.  We were admiring the lights of the bay from near Malaga Cove when we noticed a bright orange light coming toward us (but to the west) from the direction of Malibu. The orange light was constant and not blinking.  Behind the light was a tail similar to a meteorite, but the object was not traveling nearly as fast as a meteorite would.   After about three seconds, a red light came out from the rear of the object and disappeared.  Then the tail waned and the light dimmed and then went out completely.   Within one second, the light re-emerged with a large puff of smoke that was visible in the moonlight.  The light then accelerated and disappeared after approximately three seconds

records.summary: UFO fleet above Los Angeles
records.story: UFO fleet above Los Angeles Many gray-white cylindrical objecst moving east to west across the sky right above downtown Los Angeles. The event happened at around 21:30 when my daughter and her boyfriend came running in the living room and asked us to go ouside.  My wife, my daughter, her boyfriend and me looked right above us and saw a fleet of spherical objects moving.  Each object moved independently but never hitting others, some traveled longer distances but within the group.  At one point they all stopped somewhere above west Los Angeles and started moving upward and eventually could not see them.  These objects were not stars as we cold clearly differentiate them from the stationary stars in the background.   I have an iPhone with a camera but it is not able to capture images at night time,except for the moon, because of the intense light pollution of Downtown. I searched YouTube and found two videos ot recorded, very similar, incidents.  I searched for "UFO fleet" in YouTube and found ! two events, one event in Brazil and another in Delaware both incidents happened this year.  What is going on?

records.summary: white sphere with 3 triangular-shaped points, made loud humming/ringing noise
records.story: white sphere with 3 triangular-shaped points, made loud humming/ringing noise I was in the 5th grade, the whole school was outisde during lunch.  I heard a loud ringing noise.  Everybody heard it.  The sound was like when the TV stations used to go off the air and show the colored bar symbol, or the Indian Chief.  I looked up, and alomost diredctly overhead, perhaps a mile high, was this white spehere with 3 points on it - north, east and west.  This is exactaly how it appeared to me.  Picture a circle with three triangular points.  It looked like Sputnik, only it was hovering in the air for all to see, amd it moved very slowly across the sky, making this constant humming/ring.  It was a high pitched sound.  The sound was constant, no other tone sounds, no pulse to it, no rythm.  I walked up to the vice principal of the school and asked him, "What is that thing?"   He looking at it too... He said "I don't know".  After several minutes it just moved out of sight.  It was hard to tell if it was changing altitude, moving higher.  Somtime later, in class, we heard the ringing sound again.   We did not go outside to investigate, and the sound did not last very long. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: UFO found in Google Earth Street Views throughout neighborhood.
records.story: UFO found in Google Earth Street Views throughout neighborhood. While I was searching Google Earth, Street view is when I panned up to the sky, there was a perfect pink/coral colored bell shaped UFO with what seemed to be a vapor plume, or cylindrical aura under the craft (as if it was the effect of a propulsion system.)  I first thought it could be a reflection from the camera, or drivers windshield who takes the images for Google; however, wherever you go in the street views nearby, the UFO is orientated correctly in the sky; even if it is behind you (you can rotate street view images all angles.)  To see for yourself one can use Google Earth, type in 8200 Alverstone Av. Los Angeles, CA. 90045 and pan up to the sky and see it. Then travel all streets near by via "street view" and locate the image yourself.  You will find that this appears to be a UFO that is travelling very, very slowly in the northerly direction. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: UFO's are attracted to me.
records.story: UFO's are attracted to me. I was going out to my car from a relative’s house when I got half way down the driveway in the roundabout housing development a flying saucer stormed over the cul de sac halfway quietly with half the sound of a commercial airplane the the size of half the cul de sac.  At first it blinded me and the neighbor taking her toddler out of the car seat then it switched to three white lights under a skinny cow looking saucer with long blue lights on the sides.  It hovered over the cul de sac within two jumping distances of me at the time and looked as if it was checking us out.  After a 10-20 second checking me out it made a right flank about 1/10th of a mile into the sky and then went into hyperspace to the right.  If you want the feeling think about the talefane from Dr. Who with a twist being a flying saucer that was black and had to of come from some secret military base as I have never seen any aircraft like it.  I was not the only one who saw it either.  The neighb! or saw it with her son and her toddler and it was later found out that half the city called the sheriff as it was put on the news even though they saw it during the day and I saw it at night.  I filed a report with the Sheriff’s office but they swear that it was a helicopter or a plane on a training mission despite all the accounts of damages from the UFO and the military base not having any planes or radio surveillance.

records.summary: A flock of hunreds of unrecognizable objects in the Los Angeles night sky.
records.story: A flock of hunreds of unrecognizable objects in the Los Angeles night sky. A flock of what looked like satellites moved in a herd like formation from the eastern to western sky.  It first moved in a line with clusters throughout it.  Some of the objects moved at a different pace as if herding the others.  There were two brighter but smaller clusters in front and rear of the bigger cluster the front being the brightest of the two.  Once they reached the furthest point west they appeared to stop and disappear into the sky. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides little contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Multiple flying objects seen in daylight, hovering over Los Angeles
records.story: Multiple flying objects seen in daylight, hovering over Los Angeles We were heading home, going northbound on 1-5 from Los Angeles.  My husband was driving when I noticed a flash in the sky, almost like the reflection off of a mirror.  I didnt think much of it, but I kept seeing this flash from the corner of my eye. When I focused on it, I noticed it was an object that was just hovering in the sky, almost like a star... it would flash, then kind of blend in with the sky momentarily to where it almost looked like it dissappeared but you could still faintly see the outline of it, then it would reappear again.  Several more appeared, we counted a total of 5.  They were just hovering, pretty high up.  At one point they changed formation into a triangle, then they got so close together I thought they had merged into one. They were changing formation but not really going anywhere. It looked like they were changing color, from light green to silver, and then transparent again. We watched it for about 5-10 minutes until we got too far! for our eyes to see them anymore. My sister and I both got some footage of it using our digital cameras on full zoom, not very good footage but if you watch it frame by frame on the video you can see the objects appear and move around.  My sister only took about 5 seconds of footage because she didnt think she caught them on video, but on her video, you can actually see what looks like a transparent object fly by, flanked by the smaller shiny objects that we saw... pretty cool

records.summary: A possible UFO cigar-ed shaped is moving and hovering in the air for about 20 minutes while airplanes land and take off LAX airport.
records.story: A possible UFO cigar-ed shaped is moving and hovering in the air for about 20 minutes while airplanes land and take off LAX airport. On December 6th, 2010 around 11:00am to 11:30am, as I was having lunch on the roof top of my school,I was facing southwest, when out of the right corner of my eye I observed one cigar shaped craft hovering and then moving slowly across the horizon heading east. I let it go for about 10 minutes and then realize there are planes in the background landing and taking off from LAX Airport. I quickly rush to the end edge of the roof and am able to make out the craft well. Its a long cigar shaped object thats black or dark gray, there are no visible lights and the object doesn't reflect light. Every 3 to 5 minutes the craft would stop. I could see at least 5 airplanes flying right by the craft. I tried to tell myself it was a blimp or helicopter but this thing would completely stop for minutes at a time and just hover. One more thing that was strange was in the background theres a mountain like a  huge mesa almost like where the Hollywood sign is. As the craft pass! ed I saw a bright flashing coming from the mesa mountain, almost like taking pictures from a professional camera but big, it was bright and I could see it for miles away.As the craft passed the flashing stop and it continued to hover and move slowly. I was Able to take one clear picture of the craft. I tried taking video but I was unsuccessful because I have no video zoom so you couldn't see anything. The sun was also pointing in my direction.The craft then kept moving east till I lost sight because there was a building office in front of me. I couldn't see where I was pointing my Iphone but when I returned home I could clearly make it out. I used Windows picture system and I was able to zoom in. I was Shocked, it a long cigar shaped object with no visible attachments or helicopter propellers. The same day On December 6th, 2010 over LAX Multiple UFO were spotted forming a V-shaped.

records.summary: Random sighting over W. Los Angeles at midnight
records.story: Random sighting over W. Los Angeles at midnight At midnight precisely I witnessed what I initially believed to be a shooting star based off of the high trajectory and brightness.  I quickly realized the shiny, silver tear drop shape was in fact descending at a rapid rate over West Los Angeles.  I witnessed this event over the course of approximately 4-7 seconds on a balcony with a view of town standing beside my dog and when the object got within eye-sight after descending quickly I lost it or if you prefer, it vanished for lack of better explanation.  I wish this was a hoax, but it isn't and I'm just hoping it's a classic 'downed weather balloon'. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: UFO's over Silverlake
records.story: UFO's over Silverlake I live in the Silverlake section of Los Angeles and I was having coffee at an outdoor table when I noticed what looked like a round white thing in the sky.  It was very high up and was moving north.  After a few seconds, it turned right and headed west in a straight line and at the same speed.  A few minutes later, I and my girlfriend noticed other objects like the one I have described and for the next hour and a half we watched 14 or  more of them moving west in a straight line and one consistant speed which was rather slow.  Most of the objects looked round but some were triangle shaped.  Most were moving slowly west but, some just hoovered in one spot.  One hoovered for 30 min and then slowly moved north.  I went to the army surplus across the street and told the guys working there about the objects.  They got some binoculars and we looked at one of the objects.  Through the bino's I could see that the object was 3 white orbs held in a triangle frame like thing.  And as we watched another white object moved toward this 3-orbed object and was very neat it before it vanished.  All of the objects were very high up.  When jets would pass by , one could see that these objects were way higher in the sky than the jets. The objects made no sound , they made turns, changed directions , and moved in straight lines as well as hovering.  NO high speed stuff.   One thing I noticed, when I was looking at some of these objects, I would notice another similar object  behind the object I was looking at that was much much higher up. ((NUFORC Note:

records.summary: UFO impersonating a large jet aircraft, but had abnormal contrail appearance.
records.story: UFO impersonating a large jet aircraft, but had abnormal contrail appearance. On Monday 12/13/10 in the time period between 6:45 and 6:55 AM I was riding on Los Angeles Metro Bus Route #14 eastbound on Beverly Boulevard in Los Angeles, CA.  This route at that point goes straight east.  In the sky east-north-east about 15 degrees from true east was a type of UFO seen before in the desert of Eastern Oregon.  The craft was impersonating a jet aircraft, but the contrail was short, stubby, too wide, and too dense to be a real jet contrail.  The rising Sun was reflecting off the object, and creating an opalescent/rainbow sheen that real contrails don't have. The craft was barely moving at all against the morning sky.  Later the whole thing seemed solid, like the edge of a huge disk.

records.summary: Big orange orbs flying over Los Angeles
records.story: big orange orbs flying over Los Angeles I was driving home from dropping off my girlfriend at her house when I was about a block away from my home when I noticed a large, red orange but bright light almost reminding me of a meteor that’s why it caught my attention so much.  I parked so I could continue looking at the object and I noticed it was moving real slow to only one direction and knowing off the top of my head that every airplane in the sky is required to have flashing lights, this one did not.  I stared at it more because I was thinking maybe the lights are delaying or something but to my surprise it started to dim out real slow when it completely turned off.  As it was off you could tell it was round and it looked white or grey,  I kept my eye on it for about fifteen seconds when it started going out of my vision that’s when I jumped back into my car and tried to follow it but it was too late. As I got home and started to park I saw two lights that definitely looked like the same light I had just seen and these lights looked pretty big to be a plane and they also were not flashing, just a deep, bright red orange light that reminds you of the color of fire. It almost looked like it was on fire.  As I got off the car I was watching these two lights travel slow next to each other but they had a distance. The light that was on the left side dimmed maybe ten seconds after I was watching both of them and the second light took longer to turn off but as I was watching that light I was examining it more to rule out the theory of this object being out of the ordinary and I truly found this object fascinating. I know for a fact it did not have any flashing lights at all it was just glowing that red orange color, and I found it so weird how it turned itself off and you can still see the object moving in the sky, if this was an airplane or a man made object it made some illega! l moves by not having flashing lights and flying in the sky with its lights off.  If anyone else saw this, please I would very much love to hear about it.  I want to know if I was the only one to see this.  Those lights caught my eye right away so I bet it did the same to another person.  Please let me know I need to know if I was the only one person to witness this.

records.summary: looked like a jelly fish tumbling foward  with yellow,red,blue lights in sequence then turned green edges clear.
records.story: looked like a jelly fish tumbling foward  with yellow,red,blue lights in sequence then turned green edges clear. It was a very clear day the sky was blue no smog or clouds, at first i thought it was a baloon there was only one it looked white i was looking at a hawk and then it caught my eye above the hawk was this baloon moving foward then sideways back up down i was using the hawk as a marker to keep track of it..i went to my car had my rifle scope and to my amazment it was no baloon..wow it look just like a jelly fish changing from yellow,red,blue in sequence then back to  clear even had what looked like a tail..what was odd to me was the way it tumbled foward slowly the whole time but the lights didn't move they stayed centered it was above me for a while it kept going higher then the whole object turned green except the edges remained clear. it tumbled at the same speed the whole time. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Four white lights zigzagging across Los Angeles
records.story: Four white lights zigzagging across Los Angeles. I witnessed four separate white lights in the sky zigzagging from the Northwest to the Southeast (about 7.40 in the evening).  All were headed in the exact same direction making a slight zigzag motion (each light’s pattern was slightly different than the others)as they crossed the sky.   Although I couldn’t give an exact altitude at which they were traveling, I can say they seemed a lot higher in the sky than the airliners stacked headed into LAX.  Their brightness was that of the other stars in the sky and remained consistent till I lost sight of them due to the light pollution here in the city. As for their speed, they crossed the sky in about 3 seconds or so.  No noise was associated from these lights either. I tried to look up information about meteors that can make that pattern as they come in but could not find any. The sighting occurred in the parking lot of the Farmers Market/Grove (3rd and Fairfax) here in Los Angeles.

records.summary: Explanation of possible sightings in Los Angeles
records.story: Explanation of possible sightings in Los Angeles This is not a UFO report. This is an explanation. There is a cessna type airplane slying around Los Angeles which has been fitted with and LED light scroller on the underside across it's wings for advertising purposes. The scroller can display a variety of shapes, which, from a distance, may appear as stand alone shapes, and from certain angles, the airplane with the scroller on may appear as a lit up saucer with a light on top. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.story: Three large lights in the water of Santa Monica bay with very blinding lights and then they dissipated into complete darkness I was in California this weekend with my family and we went to Santa Monica bay to meet up with my cousins and while I was walking on the dock I saw three lights about the size of a punch buggy glowing in the water   I ran towards the end of the dock and the lights got brighter and brighter and then they went down to the bottom of the bay to total darkness.   Only one of my friends said he saw a very faint light when the lights got lower and lower into the bottom of the bay. records.story: Downtown night lights in Los Angeles bunch of shaping lights and rays of blue lighting. records.summary: Flickering amber mass with erratic darting movements.
records.story: Flickering amber mass with erratic darting movements. The object came toward us from the southeast. It appeared over a rooftop.  The object seemed to float toward us in our direction.  It was flickering and was amber in color. There was only one object. The object began to make quick darting movements from right to left and then back in line. as the object approached it seemed to dim.  It is hard to describe but I think it was rising.  As the object was directly over us, it completely dimmed out. I lost sight of the object at that time.  My roommate observed the object dart off to the south and disappear. Video and photos will be released as well.  We would really like the photo analyzed as we believe further activity may be apparent in the photo.  The photo and video are very important to us.

records.summary: Orange pulsating light over the Farmers Market  in Los Angeles
records.story: Orange pulsating light over the Farmers Market  in Los Angeles Noticed a pulsating orange thing (like a torch high up) in the sky moving in a Northwestern direction at a seemingly fast pace that slowed down considerably to a slow pace.  While it slowed down, the brightness of the object diminished till it came to a complete stop.   At that point the bright orange glow faded till it became a white dot that all of us saw.  It remained in the sky, stationary, for about two minutes till it continued to fade even more.  Then before it faded completely it started to move in a Northeasterly direction at a fast pace and disappeared behind a cloud (one of about three in the sky at that time). This sighting happened at the Farmers Market here in Los Angeles on a Saturday night.  It was busy and I know many people witnessed the event.  I also work at the Market and this is the second sighting I've had in about four months.

records.summary: White oval object traveling overhead northeast toward Pasadena CA in daylight.
records.story: White oval object traveling overhead northeast toward Pasadena CA in daylight. At around 2:45 pm sun, Sept 30, 2012 I was sitting on the side deck of my house in Northeast Los Angeles, an are known as Highland Park.  I was facing north with my head resting toward the sky, almost straight up. Visibility was unlimited with no clouds, light winds from the west and about 90˚F. It was a very quiet day with very little air traffic.   As I was looking at the clear blue sky I saw a tiny white dot almost overhead about the size of a dull pencil tip at arms length. I looked at it for a bit more and grabbed a pair of binoculars I had nearby, it appeared to be "metallic" white in color, oval in shape with a dark coloration toward the bottom of the object.  It was traveling northeast toward Pasadena-Arcadia in between my location and the San Gabriel Mountains. It was moving slowly so I ran inside to get my camera.  When I returned I was able to take 1 photo of the object at about a 95-80˚ angle before the roof of the house blocked it! from view. I took about 10 min to track about 4 hand widths of sky and my crude estimate would be that it was at about 10,000 to 15,000ft in altitude.

records.summary: A dark rectangular object appears over my car out on the road and telepathically tells me not to panic, that I knew it was there.
records.story: A dark rectangular object appears over my car out on the road and telepathically tells me not to panic, that I knew it was there. OVERHEAD UFO ON INTERSTATE 10  This incident is the reason for my interest in UFOs...why I’m          a member of MUFON.  The year was the summer of ’76, August. I was driving back from a visit to San Antonio, Texas, and had just seen a sign saying “L.A. 90 miles” at around 1 a.m.  I knew I was pretty tired, and this meant nearly 2 hours yet to go.  I was leaning back in the driver’s seat, feeling fatigue. Suddenly, surprising even myself, I took a deep breath and threw myself forward, now leaning over the steering wheel, now my head way under the windshield.  I glanced up...and there, overhead, maybe 15, 20 feet above the car, just beginning to fall behind, was a dark rectangular (I assumed, since the rear was out of sight, so it might’ve been square) object, keeping pace with the car.  I felt a wave of fear striving to strike me... I startle easily...  And then the following 3 sentences were planted in my head telepathically... as clearly as if I were hearing them,  but I knew my brain, not my ears, was picking them up...  “Don’t panic.”  “You’re in no danger.”  Before I could feel relief upon “hearing” those two sentences then came...  “You knew it was there anyway.”  And I was seized by a terrific jolt of fear!  I quickly pulled to the side of the road, shaking, fully expecting some kind of attack. I thought I might be incinerated...lifted up by a tractor beam, then dropped...something life-threatening.  But nothing happened. And now I wanted to get out and see if I could still detect the object. But I didn’t want to do that without a possible attack being seen by another driver. Not that I felt anyone could help me, but at least if someone witnessed my demise, he or she could make a report to the police and my family would know what had become of me.  Just as I was lamenting that no one was there to be my witness, over the top of the hill ahead came 3 sets of headlights.  Now I had witnesses, and as they approached, I stepped out of the car, hesitantly and fearfully turned around to view...nothing unusual in the sky. The object was gone.  Ever since then, I’ve been left to wonder...what does “You knew it was there anyway” mean? Is it evidence that I’ve been traced, tracked, followed my whole life and know it on a subconscious level?  Does this explain why from the age of about 4 to 7 years old I kept having a recurring dream and telling my parents in the morning that “I woke up again ‘cause I knew this big eye was looking at me real hard on the other side of the black, so I never can see it...but I know it’s there”? Of course asked in children’s language.  Does it explain an orb the size of a tennis ball coming down the hallway at my grandparents’ home at about 11:30 one summer night, slowly circling through the room, then crossing through it to stop over my head as I observed through the weave of the sheet that I’d pulled over my head out of fear...that then grew whiter and brighter and brighter till I “whited out”... and then woke up at what seemed to be instants later, even though it was about 9 a.m.? I was about 12 for that occurrence.  And did it have anything to do with several significant precognitive dreams I’ve experienced through my life and other paranormal happenings, such as dreaming my cat had been shot while I was traveling in Europe and coming back home to find she had been, though not killed as in the dream?  “You knew it was there anyway.”  It’s set me on a lifelong search.  Oh, by the way, after this incident, the following spring “Close Encounters of the Third Kind” came out. I about flipped out in the scene where Richard Dreyfus experiences loose objects flying around in the cab of his car, looks carefully and shakily out the windshield, and sees down the road a dark rectangular UFO meandering ahead of him... almost precisely my own experience.  It was almost déjà vu!  And of course convinced me I’d had a significant, maybe life-altering experience. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Several orange "fireball" type objects observed over the Arclight Theatres in Los Angeles.
records.story: Several orange "fireball" type objects observed over the Arclight Theatres in Los Angeles. Observed 15-25 orange glowing “fireball” type objects over or around the Arclight Theatres in Los Angeles, California.  They seemed to cluster together, almost making formations before burning out or disappearing.  I’m not saying these were UFOs, but they were unlike anything I have seen before.  Possibly Thai floating lanterns?   Hard to tell how large they were.

records.summary: Dark egg-shaped object seen in the early morning sky above the East  Los Angeles area.
records.story: Dark egg-shaped object seen in the early morning sky above the East  Los Angeles area. I was working field patrol as a law enforcement officer (15 years experience) when I noticed Venus shining brightly in the pre-dawn morning sky.  I went to the top floor (7th) of a near-by parking structure to use my binoculars to get a better look.  I was using low powered binoculars to observe Venus and Jupiter, which were approx. 30 degrees up from the eastern horizon.   As I trained the binoculars on Venus, a dark colored object "floated" into my field of view.  The object was oblong to egg-shaped and seemed not to hold a steady form.  There were no visible lights emitting from the object.  The object appeared to hover in a stationary position before beginning to "drift" in a southern direction.   It continued south for approx. 2 minutes, then made a distinct and sudden turn west.  The object increased it's speed as it moved west for approx. 10 seconds, then continued to hover.  I lowered the binoculars to attempt to view it with my &qu! ot;naked" eye, with negative results.  I re-engaged the binoculars and again saw the object in about the same position.  I lowered the binoculars again to try and find something to lean against to steady my view through the binoculars.  Approx. 20 seconds passed before I re-engaged the binoculars, but could not re-located the object.  I spent the next 10 minutes using the binoculars to scan the area in a "strip search" pattern to try and re-locate the object, with negative results. The sky was cloudless with a hint of marine layer haze, low on the horizon.  The object appeared to be at an altitude greater than 10,000ft., though I can't validate that without knowing it's size.  I did not see any light reflecting from the object, despite the approaching sunrise (it should have been high enough to have been above the earth's shadow).  It was dark colored, close to black, and seemed to absorb light.  I did not hear any sound I could associate with the object. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))
