You Mr. Davenport, do not deserve those kids talking to you like that.  Sorry you have to hear that.  Have a great Day. Sincerely,  ((name and e-address deleted))

records.summary: 3 Red/Orange Circles blacking out in the night.
records.story: 3 Red/Orange Circles blacking out in the night. On the evening of November 10, at 7:40 pm, I was taking my dog outside to the bathroom.  I saw 2 red/orange circles in the sky moving SSE slowly at the same speed.  It was located to the west of my position.   I told my wife to come out and witness the movement.  There were no sounds that we could hear of.  The lead circle would pulsate slightly and then die off.  Because it was dark, we weren’t sure if it blacked out or was masked by clouds.    About 10 seconds after, the second blacked out.  My wife went back into the house and I continued to walk the dog around the neighborhood.  Approximately 3 minutes later, I saw a third red/orange circle trailing the same route as the first two.   After about 1 to 2 minutes, the third blacked out as well.  I saw regular aircraft in the vicinity of these circles.  It was obvious that these red circles did not fit the profile of a normal aircraft.   Additionally, the movement was unnatural to a regular aircraft. It would shif! t mid-air.  When I got back into the house, my wife researched this to see if anyone else saw this pattern.  On the UFO Reporting Center, the description matched similar reports. I’m a former Marine Corps Officer with a MBA and my wife has a masters as well.  We have never witnessed anything like this before.  My first assumption was that these might be police unmanned aerial vehicles.  Although I have no reference, it looked extremely high in altitude. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Unidentified flying object (bright orange/red) triangular five-side polygon hovering in sky above Barham Blvd. L.A., CA. 3-29-2012
records.story: Unidentified flying object (bright orange/red) triangular five-side polygon hovering in sky above Barham Blvd. L.A., CA. 3-29-2012 At about 4 a.m. on Thursday morning March 29, 2012, a five-sided triangular polygon unidentified (bright orange/redish color) flying object appeared in the sky above Barham Blvd. near the cross street Coyote Canyon in the unincorporated area of Los Angeles.  It appeared out of no where and, seemed to hover for a minute or two and then seemed to change into a smaller circle and, started moving back and forth and in a circle motion.  The sky was a bit hazy but it was still dark and that’s why the object stood out. I couldn’t believe it.  I noticed some houses high on the canyon hill had their house lights on and I thought to myself, surely they must have seen this object as well, or anyone traveling west on Barham Blvd. at this time had to see it. It hovered for about five minutes if that, and seemed to travel south. It disappeared. I wanted to grab my IPhone and take a picture but there wasn’t enough time for me to take a picture before the object was no longer ! visible. I know someone had to see this object as it seemed to be flying much lower than a commercial airplane does. Would be great if someone else can post here about this object. I’m a university professor. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Between the mid 1950's and mid 1970's I have observed what could be described as UFO phenomena on at least four different occasions. Al
records.story: Between the mid 1950's and mid 1970's I have observed what could be described as UFO phenomena on at least four different occasions.  All these were remarkably DIFFERENT in nature and all were observed in the company of witnesses.  I first thought about reporting them to someone when I came across the Lemon Grove(CA) (sighting/landing?) description from the 70's on the Internet.  Apparently, a youth was the witness to that actual incident but I had overheard a conversation about it taking place in a coffee shop between members of the Lemon Grove Sheriff's Department within a month or so and it had peaked my curiosity since the landing had apparently been sighted in the BACK YARD of the house I had occupied for a number of years and had only RECENTLY left.   A lenghty experience with lights, one to three in number had taken place during the same period lasting for over a week.  I never followed up looking into the (landing) report. ((NUFORC Note:  We have requested that the witness submit a separate report for each of his sightings.  PD))

records.summary: Very bright object going from South to North at a very high rate of speed.
records.story: Very bright object going from South to North at a very high rate of speed. It was about 5:15 AM and I was at Griffith Park in Los Angeles in the middle of my morning exercise routine.  I looked up in the sky between a section of trees and I saw a very bright object traversing the sky from South to North at an extremely high rate of speed.  It was probably twice the size and brightness that Jupiter is at this time.   Between this section of trees the object took less than 3 seconds to move through.  I figure that to go from horizon to horizon this object took about 10 seconds.  I've seen satellites, aircraft and missiles and have never seen anything going this fast.

records.summary: Streak of bright white light over Los Angeles
records.story: Streak of bright white light over Los Angeles I was out looking at Venus around 4:30 am smoking a cigarette and saw a thin streak bright white light fall at a downward trajectory and then vanish.  It lasted less than a second. It definitely wasn't a meteor and didn't have any orange trails.  There were no sparks.  It looked like if you took a section of a piece of shoelace and cut it so it was about 6 inches long, inflated it so it was rounded, but still flat... and the shoestring glowed a bright white to almost bluish light saber glow. The shoe string was huge though.  Miles long and was miles above the ground   It flew directly over head and fell downward, then disappeared all at once.  Not like it fell past the horizon, or anything like that. So if there's anyone else who saw it also, or anyone who might know what it was, please post here. Thanks!

records.summary: "Rings of Fire"
records.story: "Rings of Fire" On June 5th approximately at 9:30 P.M. Near La Cienega & 18th Street Los Angeles, California  90035  Was Witness to 8-10 Disk-shaped rings moving from East to West slowly over my head.  These disks made an arc to the south then south east.  They came in pairs. Toward the end of the arc a plane leaving LAX flew very near the last pair before they flew up and out of sight.  There was no sound. The color was the most profound bright red-orange.  The shapes were oblong circles.  I would describe them as “Rings of Fire.”  Other witnesses to this event were my wife and two strangers in the street out in front of the house.

records.summary: Strange star like light that quickly changed direction and speed and then quickly sped off into the distance
records.story: Strange star like light that quickly changed direction and speed and then quickly sped off into the distance I was looking up at the sky in a north west area of los angeles and saw what appeared to be a satellite traveling in a south east direction.  The color was that of a star and I did not see any blinking lights that would have indicated that the object was an airplane.  It looked quite high in the sky and because of its similarity to a very bright star, and lack of lights, and speed, I assumed it was a satellite.  It was moving about 3 times quicker than a normal commercial aircraft would move.   All of a sudden the object took a sharp turn around 30 degrees to the west and its speed picked up about two to three times that of what it was originally traveling.  It traveled at that speed for about one second and then all of a sudden picked up tremendous speed and shot out of view.   The whole sighting lasted maybe 5-10 seconds.  It was definitely something I could not explain.  I've seen satellites, I've seen shooting stars, I've seen airplanes of all sorts, and t! he object I saw and it's maneuverability and speed matched none of those. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Orange orb, ascends in the southern L.A. night sky.  Disappears then reappears, a faint object in clouds moving west.
records.story: Orange orb, ascends in the southern L.A. night sky.  Disappears then reappears, a faint object in clouds moving west. Fiery red/orange orb (flare, but not because there was no "tail") ascended in southern sky.  Disappeared into night sky, out beyond a star like a television dot of old when you turned it off. One witness said, "It's still there in the clouds.  I'm not taking my eyes off it."  I went to get a telescope or binoculars.  When I came back out, witness said, "There it is in the clouds." It stopped, sizzled, spiraled down in NWestern sky to a white light.  Then appeared in the night clouds like a wafting plastic bag caught in a drift in upper atmosphere, but it moved with purpose.  As it traveled west through the clouds, it looked dark and solid; when it came into a little cloud clearing, it looked white like the color of the cloud but had shape.  When it moved into another thick patch of cloud it took on the denser color.  The shape at the top was bulbous.  It didn't jet, it floated but with purpose.

records.summary: 9 UFO lights in my back yard. MUST SEE.
records.story: 9 UFO lights in my back yard. MUST SEE. I was walking out to my back yard around 9 PM on June 5th, 2011.  As I stepped out, I noticed these strange lights in the sky.  I watched them for about 1 minute when i realized that they were moving (South) and were moving in groups.  First I noticed two, but as they moved along, more began to appear. I told my family to go outside with me to see it, and I was able to get one really good picture.  It was strange because the lights would sometimes stop, and appeared like massive stars but then continued to move.  We knew they weren't airplanes because they weren't flashing the normal red or blue lights. Once they began to move further South, it seems as if they were disappearing into the sky and becoming stars.  You could still see them twinkle, but in groups they began to go further away. No one can explain what it is that we saw, and luckily I found this site.  I see that a lot of the sightings people have seen recently are a lot similar to what we have seen.  So i'm hoping that some one finds some kind of answer as to what we saw.   I'm still amazed of what we saw and will never forget this moment! check out the pictures that I got.

records.summary: Multiple red/orange fireballs rising from the southeast horizon towards los angeles
records.story: Multiple red/orange fireballs rising from the southeast horizon towards los angeles Our house is on a hillside in the Monterey Hills/ El Sereno neighborhoods of northeast Los Angeles.  We constantly see helicopters and air traffic going to and from LAX.   We see helicopters of all types – police, media, military, fire department. On Tuesday night, June 12, 2012, we sat in our kitchen and watched 20- 30 red/orange fireballs rise from the southeast move into the night sky over a 30 minute period.   They would come in groups of 2 -4.  As each group would rise, we saw helicopters fly back and forth between them.  The time was approximately 9:15-10 pm PST. My wife and both watched this for 30 -45 minutes.  We can’t stress enough that we never see these types of lights/craft in this part of the sky, and acting with these flight/movement characteristics.

records.summary: Triangular shaped ufo in los angeles
records.story: triangular shaped ufo in los angeles My friends and I were having a bbq outside when my friend spotted a strange object.  She lives in mid-city (los angeles), but the object was over culver city (neighboring city).   For 4-5 minutes the obect hovered, and moved in circles.  It was metallic, with about 6-8 lights moving in rotation around the craft.  We live right next to the airport, and have seen planes, helicopters, on a daily basis--this was different.   We called other friends who live in the area to go outside and see if they see the object as well; they definitely were seeing the same shape.   Within 5 minutes, a military plane flew right next to it.  Soon after it started to move towards Santa Monica...and we lost site of it.  It was an amazing experience and will be looking at the sky more frequently!

records.summary: In 1954, I saw a red glowing disc traveling thousands of mph straight over the Los Angeles night sky.
records.story: In 1954, I saw a red glowing disc traveling thousands of mph straight over the Los Angeles night sky. I was 11 years old in 1947 and lived in south central Los Angeles at the time of the "flying saucer" siting.  It was night time and my friend and I saw a red glowing disk traveling at enormous speeds, southeast to northwest over Los Angeles. The flying saucer was very high in a super clear night sky. I'm a college graduate and worked for Lockheed Martin Corp. for 39 years and retired 3 years ago.  I'm 69.  I'm an amateur astronomer and I am familiar with the night sky, stars and planets.  I would call myself a "trained observer" having lived near airports and now near Cape Canaveral, Florida where missiles commonly take off.  I was also in the Air Force with the Hayward National Guard in California.  My point is that I know what I am looking at and can judge speed and altitude as well as identify night time objects in the sky. I have always described the flying saucer I saw as a looking like a round red Ford tail light of the 1950s traveling at an altitude above 30,000 feet and probably much higher (70,000 feet or more).  So, I estimate the flying saucer was at least twice the size of a modern airliner at 30,000 feet, bigger if it was higher.  The glowing red "saucer" appeared to be a perfect disk, not a ball.  The glowing red disk had no other features.  As I say, the speed of the round red disk was enormous flying horizon to horizon in less than 20 seconds at an extremly high altitude plastered against the roof one of the best night skys I have ever seen which is why my friend and I were looking up at the time.  We caught site of the glowing red disk about 30 degrees above the horizon to the southeast and watched it disappear to the northwest. My date of the siting is approximate as to month and time, but I'm pretty sure it was 1954 judging by the events going on in my life at the time.  It was a warm summer evening, and I was taking my friend home on the handle bars of my bicycle at the time as we were marveling at the clarity of the night sky and the stars. The reason that I believe it was a "flying saucer" is because no aircraft of the times in 1954 or now could even begin to match the speeds of this object.  This red glowing disk left no trail like a fireball meteor which I have also seen.  It just zipped across the L.A. night sky in a straight line horizon to horizon in a matter of seconds never losing its circular (disk-like) shape or losing speed or altitude.  It left no trail or emited sound.  If I was going to guess at the speed and altitude of the flying saucer I saw, I would say it was flying at 70,000 feet or more at speeds of tens of thousands of miles per hour.  This was not a common site in 1954 or even now with our rockets and satellites which I am also very familiar with having worked for Lockheed Corp and living now near Cape Canaveral, Florida.  Nothing in our arsenal of jets and rockets flys anywhere near as fast the flying saucer I saw that summer night in 1954. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: It shot through the sky twice, it stayed still for a while and then disapeared.
records.story: It shot through the sky twice, it stayed still for a while and then disapeared. It shot through the sky. It stopped right in the middle of the sky.  Stayed there for about thirty seconds.  And then shot about 35 degrees to the right and just stood there. It shot back a few feet went down the hemisphere and then disapeared.  It came back but disapeared again.  It wasnyt anything remote control because of the distant. It couldnt have been a plane because planes don't travel that direction where it was.  It was weird and strange but anything is possible. I know it was something i never seen before because im a skeptic and it made me want to video tape it.  Hipe ithers saw this too... It even suprised my husband and he's the more skeptical person in my life.  Lol

records.summary: Glowing orb changing colors and zigzagging across the sky over Westwood, Los Angeles
records.story: Glowing orb changing colors and zigzagging across the sky over Westwood, Los Angeles At 8:45 pm PDT, my friend and I were looking in a northwesterly direction from the third story terrace of our building and observed a round object in the sky over Westwood in West Los Angeles, CA.  At first, the object hovered over the Federal building, which is a quarter of a mile south of the UCLA campus on Wilshire Blvd.  Our building is approx. 1 ¼ miles southeast of the Federal Building.  The object glowed with a bright white light, which was significantly larger than any star or planet in the night sky. The object dropped quickly like a falling star out of sight.  Fifteen seconds later, it rose again.  The light changed to blue, then green, then red as it moved east much more quickly than a helicopter.  It zigzagged and changed direction and altitude very quickly.  At times, several colored lights appeared at once.   The round object was higher than the 12 story buildings over which it flew.   Finally, after three or four minutes, it dropped out of sight, near the UCLA campus.

records.summary: Slow moveing golden fire balls stopped and hovered then glowed red and ascended out of sight slowly.
records.story: slow moveing golden fire  balls stopped and hovered then glowed red and ascended out of sight slowly. The first golden flame came from the east to the north followed by the second one minute later .I did not see the first one go out of sight because the second one came on so fast that i gave my attention to that one solely .  This one seemed to get greater in size then go back to its normal shape all the time i am noticing a red glow from it also until it gets to were i am looking at it from the side and at this point it gets  entirely red and pulsating and looks to be completely stopped for a couple of minutes. slowly it ascends out of sight.The third fire ball comes at about four minutes later from the same direction and the same speed it seems to hover a little longer then up and away and no more sightings witnessed  after that. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: I was on vacation in Los Angeles California, a buddy picked me up from the airport we were driving down sunset blvd. to our apartment a
records.story: I was on vacation in Los Angeles California, a buddy picked me up from the airport we were driving down sunset blvd. to our apartment and I was taking pictures on my I phone for aproximately 10 min. I did not notice the objects untill I was back from vacation! ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Many ufos in the bright sky joined together and disapered less then an second.
records.story: many ufos in the bright sky joined together and disapered less then an second. There were about 12-16 stars in the bright sky and all the star shaped objects started to move very close to each other then all choose stars joined together into an big unknown craft and disappered from the area less then a fraction of a second.and I captured the whole thing on tape and pictures.

records.summary: Eight fireballs in the sky
records.story: Eight fireballs in the sky My son and I were outside sitting at our fireplace,  he was facing north when he said "those planes? look like they're too close together".   I turned around and we saw four orange-red fire balls at first flying across,  from west to east.  They were flying in a straight line, then two went up and the other two went beneath and they formed like a square.   As we continued to watch shortly after there were three more and they flew toward the other four and they were all just hovering. 	A helicopter came to investigate and as it got closer it started to rise toward the fireballs.  The first four at that time just dimmed out.  The helicopter turned toward the other three and went forward a bit.  The other three dimmed out as well.  Then we noticed another fireball about twice the size of the first seven coming from the west toward the helicopter.  At this time the helicopter turned to the east and left.   The larger fire ball slowed and began to move north bound and just zipped out of sight. 	About 3 min. later my son and I heard some loud pops and two flares were shot in the direction were all the activity had been happening.   At no time did these fireballs make any sound that we could hear.  We live in the path where commercial airplanes pass on a regular basis, on their way to the airport.  These were not airplanes! ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Fast-moving white light.
records.story: Fast-moving white light Around 10 PM (22:00 Hours) on either June 22, 23 or 24, 2013, I started looking for the Super moon.  I saw a small steady white light heading on a uniform course away from me in a southeasterly direction.  It had no other lights on it as planes have on their belly, tail or wings.   No features of a structure were apparent.   The light diminished and disappeared after about one minute.   It was silent and moved at about twice the speed of regular jet aircraft.   LAX is about four miles due south of my point of observation.   The light did not head for LAX at any time that I observed it.

records.summary: Triple green-red sphere flying over LA
records.story: Triple green-red sphere flying over LA We were in a parking lot in LA waiting for some fireworks.   A green sphere started to incessantly move in the sky.  Zooming in on it, we saw that the lights were actually three, two green and one red.   It stopped for some minutes before moving again, wheeling and flying around.  Then it vanished.   They were not fireworks.

records.summary: 2nd time witnessing two unidentified flying objects in Los Angeles
records.story: 2nd time witnessing two unidentified flying objects in Los Angeles This is now the 2nd time I have witness an unidentified flying object I reported seeing two light objects last week on Sept 28th.   Again I was at my home but in my back yard being curious from the last time I spotted the 2 UFO's I now have a habit of looking into the sky during the day time to see if there are anymore. At 5:35 pm I spotted an oval metallic object floating very high and very still in the North-West direction in the sky I would say in the direction of El Sereno area.  I couldn't believe how perfectly still this object was. This object was different from the last sighting this object was metallic in nature. I ran and grabbed my camera hoping it would still be there and snapped a few shots as best I could.   Then I seen a 2nd object fly slowly just below and past the 1st object heading North-East.  This object was round and appeared to be like one glowing red light.  It was traveling East very slowly I tried to keep an eye on both objects looking back at the metallic oval object which was still hovering in the same position.  I snapped a few photos of the glowing red light object then watched it fly slowly and then lost sighting of it after 10 minutes.  When I looked back to look for the metallic oval object it was gone.  A few minutes later a jet flew by from the south direction going north I would say it was almost as high as the two unidentified objects.  I snapped a photo of the jet so I can make comparisons of how high the jet was to the unidentified objects.  The metallic oval object stood hovering for 15 minutes and the glowing red light object slowly for about 10 minutes.

records.summary: Three red orange balls of light traveling low over the Santa Monica bay in Los Angeles and then ascending vertically and fading out of
records.story: Three red orange balls of light traveling low over the Santa Monica bay in Los Angeles and then ascending vertically and fading out of I was traveling West in the main channel toward the Marina Del Rey harbor entrance at about 9pm when, I observed two red orange balls coming from the Point Dume area.  One was following the other and they appeared to be a few hundred feet off the water.  As they approached the shoreline, they made a sweeping turn skyward and ascended through the low cloud cover, straight up, and faded away.   A third red orange ball appeared to follow the exact same path about 5 seconds later.   There were no sounds associated with the objects.  Observing aircraft taking off from LAX only a few minutes later,  I have to also add that the light or energy emitted from these objects must have been high in intensity as lights from aircraft were only visible at close distances, given the light fog and low clouds.  I drove my Avon inflatable to the middle of the channel where one of the four story party boats was coming back in from the Harbor entrance area.  I was able to confirm with the! crew on the bridge that we all had in fact seen the same unexplainable lights. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Spotted two glowing white circular shapes flying over Los Angeles
records.story: Spotted two glowing white circular shapes flying over Los Angeles. The first unidentified object was circular and glowing white that appeared towards the east very high in the sky and flew in a side to side direction then proceeded to fly north and ascended upward into the sky until it disappeared.   Shorty after another identified flying object of the same nature came from the same east direction and proceeded to follow the same path both incidents lasted 5 minutes each. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness confirms a morning sighting, at 10:45 a.m..  PD))

records.summary: Over North Hollywood CA,Aug 24, 2013 Round Glowing Object darts across the Los Angeles sky like a speeding lantern.
records.story: Over North Hollywood CA,Aug 24, 2013 Round Glowing Object darts across the Los Angeles sky like a speeding lantern. A round ,glowing, disc shaped flying object flew from the southeast across northwest at  high rate of speed. The object was not bright as a star, but was dim  and beige in color.  It was about the size of a pea in the sky much bigger than any star.  It moved slower than a falling star, but faster than any plane.  It went in a straight line, but not at a steady rate. There was no tail stream.  A second object followed it a few minutes later.  The last one was smaller about as large as the biggest star in the sky.  It flew in the same direction as the first. I watched it until it vanished in the horizon. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Fireball looking circle in the sky.
records.story: Fireball looking circle in the sky I was listening to Coast to Coast on Tuesday june 25 2013 and a guest mentioned that there were numberous reports about fireballs in the sky.   I too saw a single fireball right over north-east Los Angeles.  1 other person and I were sitting in our yard and we look up at the sky and notice a flickering but not to the point of going out in the sky.   We stared at it and thought it was a plane that was on fire. Eventually the light when out and the object stopped for about 3 seconds them continued in another slightly north of the direction it was heading.  The light then started to spark again. Flicking off and on this time.  The object looked red when the light went completely off, but looked like a fireball when it was on. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Two bright objects slowly moving and disappearing together.
records.story: Two bright objects slowly moving and disappearing together. I was in Griffith Park in Los Angeles. It was about 5:30 AM. I had just finished one of my work-out routines.  I took a couple of steps leaned against a park table and looked up.   In the dark between the trees I saw two very bright objects moving north by northwest and together very slowly, one below and to the left of the other.   I watched for about 10 seconds as they both slowly disappeared together.  They were going too slowly for satellites or airplanes.  They just seemed to appear all at once and slowly disappeared together at the same time.

records.summary: I saw a V shaped craft with no lights or sound flying through the night sky.
records.story: I saw a V shaped craft with no lights or sound flying through the night sky On the evening of March 1st 2013 around 9pm I was outside my residence looking up at the sky. You cant see too many stars normally in downtown LA, but you could see a little more than normal that night. I was looking at Orion and was surprised that you could see his sword. While gazing at that I noticed something odd moving in the sky across where I was looking. It appeared to be a V shaped craft similar to a flying wing like a B2 bomber. It had no lights at all and I couldn't pick up on any sound from it. It appeared to be a gray color, it blended almost seamlessly with the sky. There was a small prop plane in the sky as well in my vision of the sky, but it seemed to be civilian and at a much lower altitude. I turned to tell my roommate, couldn't get his attention, looked back, and I couldn't spot it again. I did some looking at drones online and the Lockheed Martin RQ-170 looks similar to what I saw, but the V wasn't as wide as the Lockheed Martin RQ-170 a! ppears to look. In any case, it was unsettling to witness and I wanted to report it for the greater good, especially if other reports have been made

records.summary: 2 small white flashing orbs following each other.
records.story: 2 small white flashing orbs following each other I looked outside of my bedroom window and noticed a bunch of birds flying around, which doesn’t usually happen in that particular area. I then noticed a very small white, flashing object.  It kept changing colors (to orange, yellow) and occasionally disappearing into the sky.  It was being followed by another one.  They were both moving to the left. Suddenly, they both stopped.  After about a minute, one of them took off to the right, and the other followed.  They both disappeared after a while.. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Sighting and dreams.
records.story: Sighting and dreams. I live in an urban environment and some really strange things have happened to me.   One night while I was walking home I saw this strange aircraft flying it looked like some kind of airplane.  I thought nothing at first, but that night I had this strange dream of the same aircraft and then I felt in my dream that I was in some sort of calm feeling and a bright light.   Then in my dream I saw these people but they were naked and they didn’t have any genitals just these holes instead.   I woke up and I didn’t think much of my dream but I kept on having the same dream.   One time when I woke up I felt sort of like a strangely pleasing feeling.  That is all that has happened with these occurrences.  I am not sure what these things are really real or if these things happened or were just a dream.  I am not sure if it’s aliens or my imagination but the dreams seem to feel frighteningly real.

records.summary: White orb slowly turns orange, and then white a few times.
records.story: White orb slowly turns orange, and then white a few times. I was walking down Santa Monica Blvd towards Century City when I noticed a white dot in the sky traveling with a fair amount of speed, in a south west direction.  It was obviously not an airplane and my thought was it was probably a large white balloon.   I took out a pair of binoculars I had with me to get a better look at it.  Balloons typically have strings attached and rock a bit due to being heavier at the bottom but this did not.  It just appeared to be a white orb....at first. The object then seemed to stop moving west and seemed to begin to ascend a bit, then remaining suspended in the same location for about 10-15 minutes.  During this time it would occasionally slowly change from white to glowing orange, and back.  It did this two or three times.  It then began to move back in the direction from which it came, and then towards me.  I believe at this point it was higher than it had initially been.  It changed to orange one more time, and back to white, and then I lost track of it after I put the binoculars down to rest my arms. I don't believe this was a balloon as it did not exhibit a string or characteristic rocking.  I believe the orange coloring was emitted light rather than reflected light, because the sun was not low enough in the sky to cause an orange reflection, the change from white to orange to white occurred slower than expected if it were an object turning such to reflect light, and when objects in the sky reflect light, the intensity usually increases to a bright point quickly, and then decreases quickly.  This object did none of these things. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: 2 UFOS over the 405 Freeway in Los Angeles.
records.story: 2 UFOS over the 405 Freeway in Los Angeles I was driving on the 405 freeway heading south.  As I was driving through the Sepulveda pass I noticed a bright white light.  I believed this to be a very bright star at first impression.  I noticed it moving very slowly from the West heading East over the freeway.  It moved slower than a plane or a helicopter would travel and then as I proceeded to start driving almost directly underneath I could tell then that there were actually two unidentified flying objects. At this point in time now (approximately five minutes after my initial sighting) I could tell that there were two objects; one craft was distinctly triangular in shape and had a different colored light at each corner. One light was red, the other was green, and the other was a faint greenish/whitish color.  The lights were going off in an irregular pattern. The other UFO was hard to look at, as the two white lights on it were so bright, I was not able to tell the space of the object itself.  Both of the UFOS were now absolutely stationary in the sky directly over the 405 freeway near Westwood.  They were not moving at all for approximately five minutes, and after that point my car had driven far too south on the freeway for this scene to still be in my view.   I have never seen anything like this in my life.  I was able to see people coming out on their balconies in their apartments whom were also pointing at the sight I was seeing. ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone with the witness, and she sounded to us to be quite eloquent and sober-minded.  We suspect that she is an excellent, and highly reliable, witness.  She commented that many other drivers probably witnessed the object.  She commented that she was flabbergasted by the sighting.  PD))

records.summary: 3 White Sphere over the City Of Angels.
records.story: 3 White Sphere over the City Of Angels. To whom it may concern, I have never thought about reporting any of the sightings I have encountered, but this is the 4 th time within 2 months, and I am sure they are alien flying objects. The reason I finally chose to report is, I wanted to be reassured of what I’ve seen and find out more info. I do believe in other worlds that are out of human reach. I will only report the latest sighting, which was today December 21, 2012, at approximately 1:00 P.M. Pacific Standard Time, of three bright white sphere shaped objects at 309 NW degrees down town L.A. As they hovered, they formed triangle shapes, and alignments, some were in straight lines, and then they would go around each other and form yet another triangle.  I have drawn a pattern of which they were forming. In the order they were formed and directions. Finally, a darker (Golden Black) bright object (can’t quite describe its shape) showed in the middle of the formed triangle, and that’s when they stopped hovering, formed one last straight line.  Darker object started vanishing, followed by the three white bright objects, until became way too far to be visible. Last but not least, it’s has always been a hypnotizing experience, where I can’t look away and my surroundings seem to have vanished.  Each of my sightings lasted about 6-10 seconds, yet it felt timeless. Thank you so much in advance.

records.summary: Strange directional "swoosh" sound in the sky near LAX draws attention of 3 witnesses to look up at an empty sky.
records.story: Strange directional "swoosh" sound in the sky near LAX draws attention of 3 witnesses to look up at an empty sky I was returning a rental car at the Hertz rental car return facility near LAX, as I have done many times before at this same location (probably more than 50 times). This day there were 2 ladies processing my return, which is unusual since normally it's a one-on-one transaction.  The three of us were standing next to the car and going through the routine process which includes questions like "did you replace the fuel" and so on. I always hear planes flying above that location, as the place is located at the foot of the runway.  This time, though, I heard a very strange sound that was somewhat similar to a jet but sounded "broken", as if it was digitally altered to sound like special FX for a movie. It was like a loud "swoosh" sound that appeared to go by in the sky above us.  The sound moved in the same direction as the planes normally do as they land, that is, westbound towards the ocean.  Instinctively, and immediately, I looked up and scanned the sky from my right to my left, following the sound, only to see a clear blue sky with absolutely nothing in my entire field of view, as far as I could see in all directions, except for the late afternoon Sun.  I have seen many planes fly above my head at that location before, and sometimes I look up and sometimes not.  This time, the unusual sound drove me to immediately look up because I was curious to see what kind of aircraft made that strange sound.  But with the sky being empty, in the end the only thing that caught my attention was the fact that one of the ladies processing my car return, who was standing in front of me and facing my direction, did the exact same head motion that I did, except she was going from her left to her right, so that we were both scanning the same section of the sky at the same time. At this point, the other lady said, "That didn't sound like a plane, it sounded like water!".  I understood what she meant - that it sounded sort of like a wave at the beach, or a cross between that and a jet plane flying by if you can imagine what that would sound like.  It was her interpretation of the sound, just as I gave my interpretation above. So this is not a report of a "sighting" per se, but I believe I heard a UFO instead of seeing one.  Right after the fact, I remember thinking to myself that the simultaneous head motion of the lady standing in front of me made me feel validated, and that there was no reason to question myself about whether I really heard a sound that appeared to come from an invisible source. For the record, I am an IT Consultant and I travel for work.  I have a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science. Although I'm not adverse to being contacted about this event,  I believe I have provided all the information available.  I am making this report in case there are other people out there who had a similar experience, so that perhaps collectively the reports can have statistical significance or provide some clue about the phenomenon.

records.summary: Morphing fireball craft, Pico/Robertson area LA.
records.story: Morphing fireball craft, Pico/Robertson area LA (This is the report I sent MUFON:  someone else saw and reported the same thing. I actually saw it on Dec. 2nd, not the 3rd.  Also, someone in the valley saw a very similar thing and posted the pics in Coast to Coast around the same time.  I will include the pics, as it is what we saw, but we saw it at night)  My wife and I were watching a noisy helicopter hovering two blocks away.  After turning away for a moment, I saw a flaming orange and red shape hovering roughlyidqay between is and the chopper.  The glowing flaming object was about 1/2 way between us and the helicopter, just above the tree line, now abot 3/4 of a city block from us. The bright object was amorphous, I could see flames rising from parts of it.  The shape was rather fluid, morphing a bit like mercury, changing shapes.  It it looked a Bit like a pair of wings to me at times, my wife saw a triangle as well, as did I, as it flowed smoothly into different forms of bright glowing orange red light. It was perfectly silent. It was not an airplane, drone, chopper, or toy hover craft or miniature chopper. It hovered, came towards us a bit, dipped down 20 degrees, swung due west, and eventually arced up steeply and went black or vanished abruptly. It was a clear night in the Pico - Robertson area of Los Angeles, near 8 pm The object was most dramatic and out of place, yet- no one seemed to notice oneoremlight in the sky.  As I pointed it out to my wife, it seemed to flow a bit brighter, and definately moved innocently a bit closer to us, or rather in our direction, and seemed to present a bit of a flourish In our direction as it made its exit, in a steep upward angle. It looked like firey glowing wings a good bit, which is meaningful to me personally; also, my Wife is an Indian Tribal member, and her tribes name translates as "Keepers of the Fire".

records.summary: Irregular flashing light near the star Betelgeuse in Orion, slowly moving in various directions.
records.story: Irregular flashing light near the star Betelgeuse in Orion, slowly moving in various directions. My friend and I were walking back from taking the dog out when I happened to glance up at the sky.  I saw a bright pinpoint white flash just below the star Betelgeuse in the constellation Orion.  At first I thought it was just the strobe from an airplane, but after watching for a few seconds,  I concluded it was not.  This light was flashing at irregular intervals and intensities, and would hoover in one spot before moving slightly and slowly to another spot.  I went inside to get my binoculars to get a better look, and saw much the same.  The object would flash irregularly with varying intensities and move slowly in one direction, and then change directions, sometimes moving up, down or back to its previous spot.  When I got tired of looking up and went inside after about 10 minutes, it had left the boundaries of Orion and was lingering a bit to the right of it. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Green short line falling down really fast in night sky.
records.story: Green short line falling down really fast in night sky We were driving south along south prairie.  My friend and I both see a short line falling to the southwest of our vehicle.  He saw it as gold while I think it's green.  Velocity was very fast, almost fast as meteorite.  But the trajectory was nothing like that.  Looks like it's falling to the ground.

records.summary: Circular craft that hovered for 1 hour near downtown Los Angeles February 23 2014 @ apx 23:00  and video taped.
records.story: Circular craft that hovered for 1 hour near downtown Los Angeles February 23, 2014, @ apx 23:00  and video taped. A cir A circular craft hovered 100 feet off the ground for an hour or more.  The craft was identifiable and appeared to be "cloaked" or partially invisible.  The circular craft had lights around the perimeter of the "object" that in a specific pattern appeared to rotate clockwise and then converged to the center "middle of the craft like something focusing energy to the center.  The craft was extremely close to our proximity as we were directly under the object.  The craft looked to be constructed of a plant/animal like an organic material  which had what appeared to be hieroglyphic type of symbols or markings one of which looked like a snake another like an eye.  The craft had an area towards the center that had a cutout and we could see "beings" what appeared to be working and at one point I felt like they were communicating to us through thoughts.  My partner could not believe what we were observing and quickly grabbed his professional camera to record this spectacular occurrence in high definition while simultaneously recording with our smartphones.  We have 3 different videos from 3 separate devices.  He is also with the media and we have worked together on many news events over the years.  There  sound was mostly silent however there was a frequency that gave us a "safe" feeling that seemed to be pulsing with the movement of illuminations "iridescent lights" it felt like we were floating but the video did not capture either of us floating or defying 3D laws of physics.  There was someone outside and we have never seen that person before.  He claimed to be a neighbor and seemed uninterested in the object that was the size of the Staples Center (sports arena/stadium). Suddenly after an hour of our observation, the craft seemed to fire some kind of blue/green- and red laser/photons that dematerialized the enormous craft and seemed to "warp" into thin air.  Again, we are both journalist and work in "mainstream media" we have been sitting on these videos for approximately a week as to investigate if any other videos or sightings were reported.  We cannot conclude if there were additional witnesses to this remarkable occurrence.  The exact location was about 4 miles from USC in Los Angeles.  The proximity of the object in reference to our location had to literally be 100-300 feet above us. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the event is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: 3 fiery red lights flying in formation over east Los Angeles.
records.story: 3 fiery red lights flying in formation over east Los Angeles. I was sitting on the couch watching TV at my friend’s apartment when I saw some very strange red glowing lights going past the window.  The apartment is on the second floor with no other buildings obstructing the view from this window, so the object was possibly 1/2 mile to 1 mile away and quite high in the sky. I saw one light, then two, then a third in a triangle formation that was spread out length-wise.  I first thought it was a blimp, but that made no sense as there were no games going on that night in LA that I was aware of. I went to the window and the lights started to spread out more.  One went higher, the other went further away and the third one kept drifting ahead on its original course.  The one that rose higher came more toward us.  We turned off the TV and heard no helicopter rotors.  There were no spotlights either, which would be expected if they were choppers flying in formation like that.  There were no blinking lights... not police lights or anything news choppers would have had.  They were just glowing red dots in the sky that were moving slowly along. Two of them flew out of sight because trees closer to us obscured them.  But the third one just seemed to be there for a moment, then we looked away for a second to get a phone to try filming them and when we looked again, the 3rd object had vanished, even though it had been moving very slowly and was in the open sky with no trees to slip behind anywhere near it. Very strange indeed.  Neither of us had any logical explanation for what we’d seen.  We kept watch for a few minutes longer, but the objects never returned. No reports of this in the Los Angeles news today or on the internet anywhere.  Would love to know if anyone else saw this.

records.summary: White rectangular rolling object that seemed to billow or create clouds as it flew by. Clouds did not dissipate.
records.story: White rectangular rolling object that seemed to billow or create clouds as it flew by.  Clouds did not dissipate. Recently I purchased an Orion telescope and have been using it to observe the moon.  Early Saturday morning I was about to pack up the scope after enjoying very clear skies over L.A., when I noticed that a thick carpet of clouds had suddenly appeared from nowhere and was engulfing the sky.  The light from the moon highlighted some of the clouds as they sailed past it.  Through the telescope I observed what looked like a large rectangular white "shelf" moving up and down, in and out of a thick cloud.  It appeared to be billowing clouds out of itself. Creating them.  I watched it for roughly 10-15 seconds before it left the scopes field of vision and I could not locate it again, mainly because I have limited sky vision due to surrounding trees. I have observed many bizarre, creepy clouds over the past few years but have never witnessed anything mechanical in behavior until Saturday.  Jh

records.summary: White 'dots' moving in formation and changing course at hard angles, LA, CA, Oct 2007.
records.story: White 'dots' moving in formation and changing course at hard angles, LA, CA, Oct 2007 My brother and I were sitting outside mid-October 2007 (Hollywood, CA) and I looked up to see what appeared to be a star "inside" the crescent moon (imagine the Turkish flag but with the star INSIDE the crescent).  This, of course, was impossible.  I pointed it out to my brother and then I saw it move...and I said "Ah, must be a plane".  It continued for a few seconds on it's path and then stopped.  And then I said "Ummm, that's not a plane".  It was a white dot, basically.  Way too high up to be a helicopter, and I don't know of any aircraft that can go that high and come to a stand-still.  At this point we were fixated. Suddenly - and I mean out of nowhere - two other dots appeared and seemed to fly in formation for a few seconds.  The 1st one we had seen starting moving again and then changed course in a highly dramatic way - as in "right angles".  The dots would appear and disappear.  I then yelled over to my neighbor, who arrived with another adult friend and 2 children.  We ALL saw these things.  I grabbed my camera and filmed for a few seconds, capturing one of them on film (albeit just a white dot in a blue sky).  On the audio track of it you can hear one of the kids getting scared, another kid saying "oooh i see them!".  I called Andrews AFB and they ref'd me here.  (I told the guy "Look, I'm not a UFO guy, but if you just look out your window towards the moon you'll see what I mean!". I also called the air traffic control tower and the Dept. of Homeland Security at LAX and got answering machines.  Go team!  I have no idea what to suggest from this. By definition, they were UFO's. I have zero affiliation with anything having to do with UFO's, this was just a crazy thing that 6 of us saw and I wanted to make a record of it here in case it helps. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Reflective orbs flying back and forth and making formations in southern sky seen from Los Angeles, CA.
records.story: Reflective orbs flying back and forth and making formations in southern sky seen from Los Angeles CA I work in Santa Monica CA and was on my way home at 3:23 pm.  It was a cloudless day and sunny.  I was just getting on the 105 freeway going east still in the city of Los Angeles.  At that time of day the traffic is very slow so I was driving under 5 miles an hour, creeping slowly and had just about reached the crest of the fly-over when I looked up into the southern sky.   At first I thought it was several Mylar balloons flying extremely high in the sky.  Then the reflective orbs started appearing and reappearing randomly.  There were maybe six or eight and they would form a line, a v shape and fly back and forth vertically and horizontally.   It was then that I realized that balloons can't make formations or fly in a straight line back and forth or disappear and reappear.  I knew I was witnessing UFOs and was thrilled.  I looked around at other cars beside me and no one seemed to be seeing what I was seeing. It lasted perhaps thirty seconds.

I spotted what I thought was a plain in the distant.  I didn't think anything of it until I looked about 3 minutes later and it's still hovering over the same spot. So I thought it was a helicopter.  But than a couple seconds later I notice it changing three different colors, green, red and white...  Green was green green, red was red red...  And so on..  It changed a color every second continuously.  I it was hovering for a long time long enought to grab my camera and put a 85mm lense on it..  I snapped some pics but it literally looks like a dot in the sky. So I was soo convince it was some unusual object something and perhaps like a UFO... I then called my friend and told her what I was spotting and how it was changing colors... What aircraft changes colors like this and have it be vibrant even from the distance.. I was prob like 5-7  miles from it.  As I was talking on the phone it th! an stopped changing colors and instead did mini blinking like what you see on a helicopter or a plain when in flies in the dark....than it flew  across the sky and out of sight. I grabbed my binoculars and could see a disk shape and under it 4 red lights in a diamond shape that changed colors from red to white or yellow and the lights moved in different formations it started to moved slowly almost over my house going south then slowly back to the spot I first seen it which was north west.  It was right above the path of planes that leave LAX that usually fly in the path over my house I wondered if any of the planes spotted it but the UFO was very high that you can easily lose it in the blue sky.  It stood hovering for 26 minutes I went inside to grab my phone camera and came back to look at it but some clouds rolled in and I could not see it any! more.  I find it odd that I spotted it again hovering in the same position as before.

records.summary: Formation of 4 round/oval craft over Los Angeles at night (no strobe lights).  ((NUFORC Note:  Pilot report.  PD))
records.story: Formation of 4 round/oval craft over Los Angeles at night (no strobe lights) I landed at Hawthorne airport in Los Angeles at approximately 9pm in a small piston airplane.  I parked the airplane and was waiting for my guests to arrive when I noticed what appeared to be 4 aircraft approaching from the west.  They caught my attention as they were dimly lit with steady lights (i.e. did not have any flashing lights) which is not typical of aircraft (airplanes/helicopters typically have flashing lights).  It was somewhat hard to determine what the craft were as they were coming towards my location so at times it appeared as though they were craft coming towards me, and because of this viewing angle, it also appeared as thought someone may have simply let go of some circular balloons that were floating "up" and may just be reflecting city lights from below (as objects at a constant altitude that are approaching you in the sky also appear to be moving "up").   Once the objects moved much closer I was able to determine that the! y were not balloons floating up but were indeed a formation of 4 separate objects flying from west to east directly overhead.  The craft flew directly overhead at what appeared to be considerable altitude (it's extremely difficult to judge, but I would estimate anywhere from 5,000 to 20,000 feet in altitude.  It was very difficult to determine the shape of the craft, as it was night time, but the craft appeared to have lights on the bottom that either outlined a somewhat circular shape or would "move" in such a way as to be consistent with a circular TV screen with various pixels turning on and off.  They were clearly all separate craft as they flew in loose formation and changed position in relation to one another, but generally maintained a somewhat traditional formation consistent with a group of aircraft (i.e. all moving in the same directly with somewhat equal spacing, with the space between the craft roughly 5-10 times the length of each craft).   They appeared to move generally in a straight line at a speed consistent with a highe r flying jet or a lower flying helicopter, yet the shape of the objects was neither of these things, and the light patterns of each were slightly different.  The light patterns almost appeared reminiscent of the large TV type display contained on the side of the Goodyear blimp, yet much more dimly lit.  One craft appear to be completely constantly lit in a circular shape.  The center was dark with increasing light towards the edges and slight color variation moving form center to edge.   The other craft shared this same general characteristic and color pattern, but the "lights" themselves were not steady state (i.e. the entire circle was not always "lit up" at one time).  One craft was lit in such a way as it looked light a two bladed helicopter rotor slowly spinning and fading a trail of fading light behind it (i.e. one line drawn across a circle that rotated and cast a fading trail behind).  This appeared to rotate at a speed of roughly once every 3-5 seconds ! (i.e. MUCH slower than a helicopter rotor system).  This object was the third in line.   The 4th object had a light patter which appeared to be a somewhat loosely drawn triangle which seemed to constantly "morph" and change position and shape within the context of the larger circle (like a screen saver on a computer screen).  The objects did not appear to make any noise, however this is not unusual of aircraft in the area as the wind, distance, and city noise can easily drown out aircraft noise. I am a helicopter and jet pilot with 14+ years of flying experience and do not believe these craft to be civilian helicopters or airplanes. I had a substantial amount of time to observe these craft (several minutes?) and attempted to take photo with my iPhone, however given the distance and the night time, I was not able to get a quality photo (again, to be expected given the conditions and equipment used). After the craft had passed overhead, and while they were still in plain view towards the east of my location, I called the Southern California Terminal Radar Approach Control (TRACON), 858-537-5900, and asked if they were tracking any formation of aircraft in the area.  The controller initially said they often routed "downwind" traffic for LAX over my location.   I indicated that the objects I was referring to were not downwind airliners headed to LAX, but rather were a group of 4 strange objects which now appeared to be well east (perhaps over fullerton airport) and were continuing to travel east bound.   TRACON employees indicated that they were not tracking any objects in that area, and said they were "Looking at the radar right now," and did not see anything that fit this description or any other unusual traffic or radar targets. The objects continued to move east and eventually faded from view (as any aircraft would).

records.summary: Seven to Eight Mysterious High Altitude Objects Moving in Formation Overhead in Southern California.
records.story: Seven to Eight Mysterious High Altitude Objects Moving in Formation Overhead in Southern California This sighting occurred during one of my frequent weekend hikes up the Verdugo Mountains.   After reaching on of the the peaks,(an altitude of 2940 feet), I reclined to rest on a concrete platform near one of the newly constructed transmission towers, I witnessed four "extremely high altitude" white circular objects.  They "appeared" rather than "approached" as would be the case with any traditional aircraft.  These objects were not unlike a satellite in size but unlike a satellite they did not move across the sky at the expected speed.  They hovered and moved very slowly in a more or less linear formation in the direction of Palmdale and Lancaster.  These objects seemed to leap frog one another at times, appearing and reappearing.  They eventually moved out of sight. Five or ten minutes later, my interest peaked, three more objects appeared very near the same position, directly above me.  Similarly, the three objects were small white circular lights hovering at an extremely high altitude.   One of the lights was flashing, reflecting light back, unlike any of the other lights previously observed.  I interpreted this as the one object to be rotating with a reflective surface. Like the other objects, these three moved away slowly and eventually out of sight. As I observed these truly unusual objects I had plenty of time to consider the possible explanations.  I ruled out conventional aircraft.  These things were hovering. They moved much too slow and were at too high an altitude.  I ruled out satellites.  They were too close to one another and satellites don't just "appear" and they don't move in mass formations.  I ruled out stars.  Duh.  I could not, however, completely ruled out high altitude weather balloons of some kind.  They were not any sort of balloons I'm aware of at the least.  If they were balloons, they were huge and moving in formation with one another and one was flashing or reflecting light. With Edwards AFB so close, I am guessing these things were military in origin.  The funny thing is that moments before I saw them I said to myself I wonder if I'm going to see any UFO's this time, and sure enough there they were.   Pretty cool and interesting sighting for me.  I'll never forget it.  I just wish I had a telescope with me!

records.summary: A star like object, flashing red and blue as well as glimmering, in a west-southwest direction in Los Angeles.
records.story: A star like object, flashing red and blue as well as glimmering, in a west-southwest direction in Los Angeles. It was about 9PM in Los Angeles, I was walking to my car up the street to get something out of it, and I looked up in the west-southwest direction and saw what looked like a star, except I could see that it was glinting or glimmering, and very obviously turning blue and red. I live under a flight path, so I've seen a lot of airplanes above my house and coming in from the distance, but this looked much higher and farther away than they usually are.  I then thought it might be a police helicopter, because of the presence of red and blue lights and the fact that it wasn't moving, but again, it was so high and so far away,  I've never seen a helicopter that high up before.  If it was a police helicopter, it was extremely high and definitely over the ocean. I continued to watch from my apartment balcony for approximately 45 minutes. The only movement from the light was that it very, very slowly traveled down toward the horizon.  I only noticed this movement because I could tell that it was in a different position relative to the top of an electric pole than when I first started watching it.  This is also how I could tell that it wasn't a star, because none of the other stars in the sky had moved that much since I had begun watching. I filmed it on my small digital camera that I have. It's very poor quality, but you can plainly see that the object is flashing red and blue (and maybe other colors too).  I notice that you don't have an option to send video, so I've uploaded my poor quality video here:  http://youtu.be/haWsy8exV24  (I removed audio because I was on the phone while filming). Again, it was glimmering or glinting as well as flashing red and blue, sort of from one side of the object to the other, while maintaining a consistent bright white light as well. I want to say that I saw it slightly wiggle around or move slightly in its immediate area, but that could have been my eyes playing tricks on me. I watched it until it went behind the hill that was blocking my view, and I'm not sure how much longer it was there for after that.  I've done some research online and can't find anyone else who had seen it. Thank you.

records.summary: Two faint bluish-white lights streak in a slightly wobbly way under the lunar eclipse over LA.
records.story: Two faint bluish-white lights streak in a slightly wobbly way under the lunar eclipse over LA. I was looking up at the closing stages of the lunar eclipse with two companions who were speaking and not paying attention when I suddenly noticed two faint but distinct bluish-white lights streaking across the sky just a few degrees below the moon. From my vantage point in the Hollywood area the eclipse was taking place in the sky south from us at a high, approximately 75 or so degree angle.  We stood next to the base of a one story building, which took up two-thirds of the view of the southern sky.  The eclipse took place a few degrees above the tiles of the roof, and just a few degrees below a cable tv wire.  The objects streaked through this view within these narrow sky boundaries.  They moved in a 10:00 o'clock to 4 o'clock path at a rate of speed fast enough to span this space in just a few seconds. I began tracking the one on the left, which seemed slightly brighter while it also trailed one that I only barely perceived that was almost immediately below the line of sight due to the roof. I was able to view it for only 3 seconds before it too was blocked by the roof.  It took place as the haze of the marine cloud layer was passing over the city, and the haze was backlit somewhat by the moon making the observation attempts by my friends very challenging in the brief moment they had to respond to me. I immediately tried to understand what the two lights were since they were not flying in a straight line despite having a velocity similar to shooting stars.  The precise movement of the lead one on the right couldn't be observed but I clearly saw the one on the left have subtle shifts and wobble-like movements as it rapidly traversed my line of sight and miles of the sky in those short moments. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: I was looking at LA skyline from the north. The sky was overcast. Then a bright flash from the west caught my eye! The white flash of l

It cast a huge circular shadow on the clouds!   The white flash of light only lit up maybe a quarter of the object!  But that quarter shadow was maybe half the size of downtown LA!

records.summary: MOST INTERESTING UFO I HAVE SEEN.
records.story: MOST INTERESTING UFO I HAVE SEEN. I am a commercial pilot/cfii, aircraft mechanic MASTERS FROM EMBRY RIDDLE. OBJECT SEEN LOOKING TO THE WEST OVER KLAX.  CLEAR SKY NO HUMIDITY.  THE OBJECT WAS SLOW MOVING.  VERY LARGE LIGHTS WITH CHANGING FOG LIKE LENSE X THREE BEAMS THAT WERE 120 DEGREES APART HORIZONTAL TO MY OBSERVER VIEW.   THE OBJECT MOVED VERY SLOWLY TOWARD MY ADAVANTAGE POINT.  THEN STOPPED AND SLOWLY OVER SECONDS DISAPPEARED.  AFTER SCANNING THE AREA THERE WAS TOTAL DARKNESS FOR AT LEAST FIVE MINUTES.  THE AN AIRCRAFT THAT WAS OBVIOUS FLEW FROM SOUTH TO NORTH OVER THE LAX CORREODOR WITH RUNNING LIGHTS AND THERE WAS NO EVIDENCE OF HUMIDITY.  MEANING NO FOG SEEN. ((ADDENDUM FROM WITNESS)) The beams appeared conically eminiating from a central point. but they were limited in their projection.  The beams terminated maybe at max 50 yards and did not penetrate like a laser.  Appeared like headlights in the fog, but did not project very far. I am a commercial pilot/flight instructor.  Also teach aircraft mechanics.  I have a background in microcontroller programming and optical sensor design. with lasers.  Masters degree in human factors in aviation/aerospace safety.  Specialty in human vision and machine interaction.  As well as being a nurse.  Not my first UFO sighting.  I am very careful about judging what I see.  This one was very interesting.  I gave you my background because I have good analytical skills.  Would love to assist your organization from time to time. Thanks ((END ADDENDUM))

records.summary: UFO made of lights photographed in Hollywood.
records.story: UFO made of lights photographed in Hollywood I was at Hollywood Forever cemetery in L. A. sightseeing with my husband, when I felt strange and had the sensation that maybe an earthquake was going to take place, and also noticed birds stopped singing.  The trees in the area, which was an empty part of the cemetery with no people and many palms, started to move strangely and bend from the tops as if pulled.   I felt odd.  I took a picture of the palms and then applied a simple vignette filter to the photo in-camera (Canon EOS 60D) and saved it, not noticing the object at all at the time. Afterwards, we went to our car, which was a ten-minute walk away, and found the battery completely dead, to the point we had to buy a new one from AAA to start the engine, and the alarm was going off only when switched off/battery removed, which was impossible.  We went home, and when I downloaded the photo we saw the object.  When we returned home I had severe red sunburn even under my clothes.  Since this day I have had severe sunburn even if I go in mild sun, whereas before I could sunbathe without sun protection. We now live in Spain but I would like to know what happened.

records.summary: Two rapidly blinking red lights in the west at dusk over Los Angeles.
records.story: Two rapidly blinking red lights in the west at dusk over Los Angeles. From my backyard in northeast Los Angeles, at approximately 5:18 pm on November 24, 2014, I looked toward the western horizon after sunset.  The sky was a deep cobalt blue with the rapidly approaching night.  I then saw a pair of red lights blinking in rapid succession due west about 50 degrees above the horizon.  The apparent size of the lights was comparable to the apparent size of a star. The lights moved in a steady fashion and in a slow apparent speed.  They moved forward as if flying side by side from one another (instead of in a line, trailing each other).  The red lights were approximately 15 degrees apart from my vantage point. The distance between the lights did not change during my observation.  The lights blinked in a definite pattern which did not change (left-left.….right-left-right-right……..left-left….right-left-right-right…..in rapid succession.)  The two blinking red lights moved slowly north and then continued off to the northwest until no longer visible at approximately 5:26pm.  There was no sound associated with the lights as far as I can tell. The relative positions of the lights as they moved gave me the impression that I was witnessing a massive winged aircraft flying silently in the sky, with each blinking red light located at the end of each wing.   However, no aircraft (spacecraft?) assembly was discernable between the two blinking lights.  No other lights were associated with my observation, such as the constant glow of green and red lights one normally sees in civilian aircraft. I, the observer, am a private K-12 tutor with an interest in science.

records.summary: Very high, very large boomerang shaped craft, ex-ray like white soft translucent glow color, turn and sped away at rapid speed.
records.story: very high, very large boomerang shaped craft, ex-ray like white soft translucent glow color, turn and sped away at rapid speed. sitting in back yard with girlfriend.  i often look into the night sky. love star watching. i see a lot of helicopters, blimps, spot lights, low aircraft small planes, 36,000 feet high commercial plans, loads of chem trail planes, so i know the typical lights. we saw a boomerang shaped craft, a cloudy white, translucent light glow.  my girlfriend described it perfectly, it looked like an ex-ray, boomerang shape, guessing 100,000/150,000 feet high, large, about half mile wide, slowly drifting high across the sky.  if you held your arm up straight and held your finger and thump one inch apart, that was about the size of the craft we saw.  after watching it cross the sky for 20/25 seconds, i got up to run inside for binoculars, the craft turn left to head north, and speed away at a rapid speed.  it has really freaked my girlfriend out. me not so much.  i've also seen a black triangular craft... reported both sightings with mufon.  please feel free to contact.  thank you.

records.summary: L.A. Airport flight path bright as a diamond laser flittering flickering object
records.story: LA Airport flight path bright as a diamond laser flittering flickering object. 945 am.  I was looking ENE towards Downtown LA from the Venice/Mar Vista area.  The LAX flight pattern coming in goes directly over here, Venice/Centinela Blvds.   For 5 minutes something non-aeronautically flying around, jumping positions in an instant flittering around, getting as bright as a diamond or laser beam at times.  Flying exactly the altitude and flight path of LAX arrivals.   I don't think it was a drone, the brightness intensity was incredible on a sunny bright morning, the only time I have seen anything move like that was the 1989/90 Area 51 horizon object video and Lake Mathews, CA, after ((name deleted)) gave a SSBE speech Santa Monica hinting to go there.   I called FAA L.A., they seemed unconcerned, 'always some things unexplainable'.  With the drone, terrorist concerns, something anomalous in the flight parh, I was hoping to be taken more seriously.   Wish I had a camera at the time to youtube post, will always regret.   I don't know if this is related, but 2 hours later near Santa Monica Airport, I witnessed 3 black helicopters and 2 black Osprey/VTOLs ((deleted--flying)) towards the coast

records.summary: Flash of light that leaves a trail - spotted over Los Angeles, California!
records.story: Flash of light that leaves a trail - spotted over Los Angeles, California! It was a very short encounter.  I was taking out the trash from Christmas dinner.   As I'm walking back to my front door, I'm looking up at the sky, stargazing, and out of nowhere, with no warning, I see a flash in the sky move at incredible speeds in the sky.   The flash of light leaves behind a faint trail for about a second, then vanishes, along with the flash of light. I stood in my front yard for 3 or 4 more minutes, but to no avail. records.summary: Bright light knocked out my phone, lights, and new car died all at once, Dr. saw the same thing!!
records.story: Bright light knocked out my phone, lights, and new car died all at once, Dr. saw the same thing!! It was after 10:00pm, I was looking out my front room window and talking on the phone, the owner of the apt. building was backing out of the driveway, backing up the hill!   Then all at the same time the lights went out all over the area, my phone went dead, and the owner of our buildings car went dead and at that same moment there was a giant very bright light came over me and the apt. owner, and it was so bright you could see the veins of the ivy plant leaves!    The apt. owner looked out her window up into the light and then at me and she kept on trying to start her car, then I looked up to see where the light was coming from and all I could see was a circle of clear blue sky, then everything came back on at the same time and the light went off!   The next day the owner said do not tell anyone, they will not believe us!  She worked at a local hospital, and she was a doctor!  I at that time was a stay home mother!   I have had 6 encounters through my life, this was one of them, at the same apt.  I got up a few years later to go to the bathroom and there was an alien in the bathroom, I seem to know her!  I asked her if I could touch her and she let me touch her hand to be sure she was real!  The same alien was out here in the desert around 20 years ago and she informed me that they are not from another planet, that they are from our future 25 thousand years from now, that we could not find any life on any other planet so we found a way to use time travel and we changed our dna!   The first time we were living out in a desert and they came to our car and took us out after my mother went crazy over what was happening to us, they were all white and glowing, we hovered over the desert floor, we were taken into a foggy yellow whitish fog and the next day we were back in the car and my sister tried to tell our parents what had happened and my step dad asked her to point to where they took us and as she did a cactus came up from the ground and went through her hand and all we did was try to remove the needles !!Now this was around 1951 or 52! ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Seagulls morph into glowing UFO's.  ((NUFORC Note:  Images are not apparent in video provided by witness.  PD))
records.story: Seagulls morph into glowing UFO's Location:  Los Angeles, Ca/Playa Vista 90066  		South East in the sky (Very High Up)  Time:   11:41AM/1140hrs   Duration:  2 Minutes tops   Sighting:   I stepped outside my upstairs patio to enjoy a cup of coffee this afternoon.  I looked up to admire the beautiful weather and the clear sky.   I noticed a group of seagulls flying in formation.  They passed, then three seagulls remained flying in the air without the rest of the group.   As I continued to watch the birds I kept thinking my mind was playing tricks on me due to the height of the birds.  They seemed to be flying higher and higher in the sky with a swirl type motion without flapping their wings.  Then the more I looked at the birds, the wings seemed to morph into their bodies.   I was only able to focus on one bird as they appeared smaller.  It got smaller and smaller then turned into a white dot in the sky.   The next thing that happened is that it started to glow a white bright light.   Then, lastly, it turned into a tiny, red, glowing dot in the sky.  It was the size of a tiny star in the sky, but glowing red in broad daylight in a clear blue sky.   It was the most bizarre thing I think I ever witnessed.   Basically, I saw a seagull turn into a glowing orb.   The best part about it was I caught it on my iPhone.  It is very hard to see. ((NUFORC Note:  Images are not apparent in video provided by witness.  PD))
